snippet: Monica Bill Barnes & Company brought a program of three dances to the Reynolds Industries Theater on Monday as part of the American Dance Festival in Durham, N.C.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews program of dances performed by Monica Bill Barnes & Company, including the premiere of Barns' duet Luster, at the American Dance Festival in Durham, NC.
lead_paragraph: Monica Bill Barnes & Company brought a program of three dances to the Reynolds Industries Theater on Monday as part of the American Dance Festival in Durham, N.C.

headline.seo: Monica Bill Barnes Company at American Dance Festival
headline.main: Chair in the Teeth, Feathers on the Head, Maybe Feet on the Floor
headline.print_headline: Chair in the Teeth, Feathers on the Head, Maybe Feet on the Floor
